questions.quote: Jerry, I like being with her. Plus, I know where she is all the time. I have relatively no competition. An-and you know how you live in fear of the pop-in?
Would you stop it? You'll have plenty of time to destroy it after I get it. Hey, George, I'm buyin' this car.
Little Jerry's going to get his clock cleaned. I gotta get him outta there.
OH, AH! OH! WOW! WHOA! A COMMIE! Wow, gee, man it must be a bummer for you guys what with the fall of the soviet empire and everything .
I don't know, I don't know, what should we do? We called an ambulance, does anyone know first aid?
I think you absolutely have to say something to this guy. Confront him.
Well I.. ran out onto the court an' threw a hotdog at Reggie Miller. "Involved." An' they threw meee, an' Reggie, an' Spike out o' the game.
I hope you realise what you've done. You've destroyed our whole venture.
Yeah, well, how 'bout if we give one out to every member on the condo board.
Ah, yes. Well this certainly looks like a lot of words. In record time. I'm very impressed ... with both of you.
